title: Why do I suck w/ everyone that's not fiddle?
body:
As per subject. 
Check out win %'s this season and historical - Fiddle = 60% always. The rest, mid 40's....

Any other champs like fiddle?

replies.body:
Fiddle is quite a unique champion, and I think you'd be hard pressed to find someone like him. 

What you you like about him?
Maybe that would help a little in finding someone new :D
Vladimir, Warwick, Yi, Malphite, Nocturne, Maokai are similar.
